title: Cartel leader killing raises fears ahead of FIFA World Cup
desc: The killing of cartel leader El Mencho has sparked violence in Mexico, raising security concerns as the country prepares to host the 2026 FIFA World Cup.

title: More than 500 families threatened with forceful eviction in Masindi
desc: Masindi, Uganda | THE INDEPENDENT | More than 500 families in Masindi district are on the verge of forceful eviction from their ancestral land. The affected families are from the villages of Kitinwa, Kyakatera and Kyamaiso in the sub counties of Kijunjubwa,Bikozi and Bwijanga. The families are feuding with Ahamed Sewagudde, a tycoon over a â€¦
